amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to ensure that none of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act may be made available to implement or enforce General License No. 8H, issued by the Office of Foreign Assets Control on October 25, 2023.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement or enforce General License No. 8H, issued by the Office of Foreign Assets Control on October 25, 2023, which authorizes transactions with certain Russian financial institutions related to energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 174 (Roll no. 629).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 174 (Roll no. 629).
